1.name: Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages
1.description: The story of a poor young woman, separated by prejudice from her husband and baby, is interwoven with tales of intolerance from throughout history.

2.name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
2.description: A French professor and his daughter accompany Captain Nemo on an adventure aboard a submarine.

3.name: A Daughter of the Gods
3.description: A sultan agrees to help an wicked witch destroy a mysterious young lady, if the witch will bring his young son back from the dead with magic.

4.name: Sherlock Holmes
4.description: When a couple of swindlers hold young Alice Faulkner against her will in order to discover the whereabouts of letters which could spell scandal for the royal family, Sherlock Holmes is on the case.

6.name: Judex
6.description: A twelve part serial following the adventures of the masked vigilante Judex as he fights against criminals led by the corrupt banker Favrauxom.

7.name: The Fall of a Nation
7.description: Three acts and a prologue. Act 1: A nation falls. Act 2: The heel of the conqueror. Act 3: The uprising two years later.

8.name: The Dumb Girl of Portici
8.description: Fenella, a poor Italian girl, falls in love with a Spanish nobleman, but their affair triggers a revolution and national catastrophe.

9.name: Where Are My Children?
9.description: A District Attorney's outspoken stand on abortion gets him in trouble with the local community.

10.name: Snow White
10.description: Snow White is a motherless princess, who arouses the jealousy and hatred of Mary Jane, her mother's former lady-in-waiting, who is the ugliest woman in the kingdom, but aspires to the ...                See full summary »

11.name: Gloria's Romance
11.description: An adventurous young girl in Florida gets herself lost in the Everglades and finds terror and excitement, as well as the rivalry of two men in love with her.

12.name: Vingarne
12.description: An adaptation of Herman Bang's 1902 novel "Mikaël." A sculptor befriends a young painter who becomes his model. Their friendship is thrown into turmoil when they both fall in love with the same woman.

13.name: The Mysteries of Myra
13.description: Myra Maynard, is plagued by a wide variety of metaphysical assaults by the corrupt Black Order, a secret organization which uses magic, curses and any supernatural means possible to achieve its ends.

14.name: The Half-Breed
14.description: An outcast named Lo Dorman encounters a young woman lost in the woods. He defends her from danger in the forest and from Sheriff Dunn.

15.name: Less Than the Dust

16.name: Lovely Mary
16.description: Mary Lane and her cousin Claiborne want to sell some land left to them by their family. Real-estate agent Roland Manning falls in love with her, and prepares a deal that will make money for...                See full summary »

17.name: Joan the Woman
17.description: A WWI English officer is inspired the night before a dangerous mission by a vision of Joan of Arc, whose story he relives.

18.name: Posle smerti
18.description: Andrei lives a secluded life with his aunt, studying and thinking about his now-deceased mother. His friend Tsenin is concerned, and tries to get Andrei to accompany him to social events. ...                See full summary »

19.name: Sold for Marriage
19.description: A poor Russian girl's beauty leads her unscrupulous uncle to bring her to the United States. There he is going to sell her into a marriage with a rich old man she has never met. But her ...                See full summary »

20.name: His Picture in the Papers
20.description: A young man can only get the woman he loves if he becomes famous and manages to get his picture in the newspapers. He determines to let nothing stand in the way of his doing exactly that, ...                See full summary »

21.name: Hell's Hinges
21.description: In the wayward western town known as Hell's Hinges, a local tough guy is reformed by the faith of a good woman.

22.name: War Brides
22.description: Joan is loved by a young man of the village and they are married. In a few weeks the husband, a soldier, is sent to the war-front along with his three brothers. Word is received that her ...                See full summary »

23.name: The Good Bad Man
23.description: An outlaw calling himself Passin' Through halts his "evil" ways long enough to help out some children in difficulty.

24.name: Maciste alpino
24.description: A soldier of near-superhuman strength fights battles in the First World War and wages a private war to rescue a young woman from the castle where she is imprisoned.

25.name: Hoodoo Ann
25.description: A little orphan girl believes that her life is falling apart. It seems that everything that could possibly go wrong does go wrong. However, certain things happen that begin to make her ...                See full summary »

27.description: Sally Pinkus is an German-Jewish boy who takes a job as a shoe store clerk after being expelled from school for goofing around. Soon fired for trying to court the owner's daughter, Pinkus ...                See full summary »

28.name: Homunculus, 1. Teil
28.description: Part of the artificial-creature series encompassing Der Golem (1914 and 1920), Alraune (1918, 1928, 1930) and Metropolis (1926), 'Homunculus' was the most popular serial in Germany during ...                See full summary »

29.name: East Is East
29.description: Victoria Vickers, a little East End Cockney girl, is left a vast fortune by an uncle in America. She is finally discovered hop-picking in Kent by her solicitor, who has given up the search ...                See full summary »

30.name: Romeo and Juliet
30.description: Shakespeare's classic tale of ill-fated lovers whose deaths bring peace to their warring families.

31.name: The Call of the Cumberlands
31.description: A family feud erupts in the mountains of Kentucky.

32.name: Shoes
32.description: A young working girl must suport her family on only five dollars a week. The strain of trying to feed, house and clothe her mother, her father and three brothers finally gets to be too much...                See full summary »

34.name: Peggy
34.description: Peggy, a rambunctious young American girl, goes to Scotland to visit her uncle. Her American ways both shock and eventually delight the people of the old village - especially the handsome ...                See full summary »

35.name: Homunculus
35.description: A group of scientists, led by a Professor Ortmann, produce a living human child using scientific processes - a "homunculus." This creature is human in every way, except that he cannot experience love.

36.name: Oliver Twist
36.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

37.description: Wynne Mortimer, a pampered society girl and daughter of William Mortimer, a prominent business man, chances to meet David White, a young artist whose fame is already assured, at an art ...                See full summary »

38.name: Under Two Flags
38.description: Lewis Victor of the French Foreign Legion is actually Bertie Cecil, a British nobleman hiding from dishonour for a crime actually committed by his brother. He is loved by Cigarette, a camp ...                See full summary »

39.name: Seventeen
39.description: Seventeen year old William Sylvanus Baxter has fallen madly in love with young coquette, Lola Pratt. After spending all of his money on the fickle girl, she runs off with an older man. ...                See full summary »

41.name: Tom Brown's Schooldays
41.description: A squire's mischievous son becomes a boarder at Rugby.

42.name: Friday the 13th
42.description: When a judge is financially ruined by Peter Brownley, a Wall Street millionaire, his daughter seeks revenge by getting a job in the tycoon's office. She manages to discover information that...                See full summary »

45.name: Hævnens Nat
45.description: A criminal escapes from prison, however a betrayal leads to his second arrest.

46.name: Flirting with Fate
46.description: In the midst of an emotional depression, a man hires a murderer to kill him. But the despair soon passes, and the man must now escape the killer he's hired to end his life.

47.name: Going Straight
47.description: A man and his wife both have criminal pasts, but have quit crime and are now respectable citizens. One day a member of their old gang shows up and threatens to expose them if they don't ...                See full summary »

48.name: Fången på Karlstens fästning
48.description: About a group of villains stealing a formula for an explosive. They kidnap the daughter of the man who owns the formula, because she has seen them steal it.
